creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
A popular open source repository for AIX installs two architectures of openssl in:

/opt/freeware/lib and /opt/freeware/lib64

but acinclude.m4 will always pick lib/.  It does not use pkgconfig.

On AIX, 64-bit builds have the OBJECT_MODE environment variable set to "64".

(not a regression)
